PR: Add Tic Tac Toe single-file app (tic-tac-toe.html)

Closes #1

Summary:
- Adds tic-tac-toe.html: a self-contained playable Tic Tac Toe game.

How to test:
- Open tic-tac-toe.html in a browser. Play a full game. Verify win/draw detection, restart, and keyboard navigation.

Notes:
- Score is persisted in localStorage.
